column1: sherry mc. watters cogsdill| dateline clinton
column7: 2015 at her home. she was born in winnsboro and was a daughter of the late douglas and iller pearl webb mc. watters. sherry was formerly employed with district 56 schools and with whitten center. she is survived by her daughter
column8: natalie cogsdill of the home; her brother

column11: barry dale mc. watters. funeral services will be held on sunday
column12: june 14th at 2 pm at the gray funeral home chapel with burial in rosemont cemetery. the family will receive friends saturday evening from 6 to 8 pm at the funeral home. the family will be at the home of her brother
